title: Chouja Raideen
synopsis: Hishou, Ginga, Ace, Hayate, and Ikazuchi all work at a studio doing various idol-related jobs at the request of their manager, Reiko. But in reality, these five teenagers are really the Reideens, a group of superheroes who fight the Super Devils sent by Lushu, a mysterious being. Little do the Reideens know, these Super Devils are being sent for a more important purpose...
staff: [['Kawase, Toshifumi', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Yamaguchi, Yuuji', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Sonoda, Hideki', ['Script', ' Series Composition']], ['Takamatsu, Shinji', ['Storyboard']]]
